item.title: Spec Help
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

Well I had made vls and stat hammer and anchor into my server and never had specs on it, but today i took some specs out of another source, and when i spec someone I dc? Any help?
Heres the code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9802 && specialAmount > 24){
setAnimation(6502);
usingSpecial = true;
updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
specialAmount -= 25;
getHit(5);
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit+10);
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis();
getHit(10);
specOn = false;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9814 && specialAmount > 99){
setAnimation(6505);
specGFX(728);
usingSpecial = true;
updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
specialAmount -= 100;
getHit(5);
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit+10);
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis();
getHit(10);
specOn = false;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4508 && specialAmount > 99){
setAnimation(5870);
specGFX(734);
usingSpecial = true;
updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
specialAmount -= 100;
getHit(5);
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit+7);
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis();
getHit(10);
specOn = false;
}

Read full topic
